column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Text=The Green Party in essence , is attempting to bring a measure of direction and purpose back into the Political realm by re-establishing a set of base “ values ” from which we can move forward and agree upon as common goals for human society , and this , I believe , is where the electorate is missing the point .
#Text=What should be the first order of business in the 39th Legislative Assembly ?
#Text=My priority , if elected , would be to halt all expansion / new development on our more essential lands and work at bringing in a form of Land Value Taxation .
#Text=Are the property taxes in your riding at a fair level for the amount of services received in the municipality ?
#Text=No. Property taxes are likely not high enough for the new developments , for they are a burden on the downstream ( or upstream ) services [ like the electrical , water and sewer networks ] .

#Text=The initial development charges were not high enough to cover all of the costs of expanded services for these new developments , so it is likely that tax rates would need to be higher for the newer developments , however we also now have a situation where the older developments are undergoing the slow decay of their built infrastructure , which will potentially require a complete overhaul of their services [ primarily water and sewage systems , but also roads and other hard infrastructure ] , which may require the intervention of the Province to assist these communities in undertaking upgrades .
#Text=How can the province lead the way in stimulating job creation ?
#Text=The province must vocally and monetarily encourage a shift in the direction we are headed with respect to the manufacturing sector .

#Text=Our reliance on the traditional automobile manufacturing sector for a large chunk of our economy can only be detrimental to the prospects for jobs as the entire industry haemorrhages in North America for lack of innovation .

#Text=We need to diversify our economy into new energy technology and value-added goods and services rather than taking a narrow view and only making our province “ attractive to investors ” and relying on corporations to provide the employment opportunities .

#Text=The government should become much more proactive in helping to establish new companies by providing ‘ seed money ’ and business expertise where necessary to encourage entrepreneurs to move faster toward creating the infrastructure necessary to make our society more sustainable .
#Text=What are your views on the mixed member proportional representation ( MMP ) referendum ?
#Text=I am completely in favour of the system .
#Text=MMP will guarantee Green representation at Queen 's Park .
#Text=Something that is long overdue .
#Text=What role , if any , does " new media " play in your campaign , and the campaign of your party ?
#Text=( websites , blogs , Facebook , YouTube videos , etc )
#Text=Do you view it as beneficial , or a challenge ?
